languages.text: "Я открылся вам, а вы так просто отвернулись от меня — после всего, что услышали? Прискорбно. Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "Я открылся вам, а вы так просто отвернулись от меня — после всего, что услышали? Прискорбно. Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

languages.text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"
languages.original_text: "Я открылся вам, а вы так просто отвернулись от меня — после всего, что услышали? Прискорбно. Я надеялся обрести союзника в вашем лице, но вы лишь оттягиваете завершение этой печальной истории. Защищайтесь!"

traits.locale_text: "I opened myself to you, but you have casually turned me away even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but you are merely delaying the conclusion of this rueful story. Defend yourself!"

"I opened myself to you, but you have casually turned me away even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but you are merely delaying the conclusion of this rueful story. Defend yourself!"

"I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regretful. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Defend yourself!"

"I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regretful. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Defend yourself!"

"I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

"I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

languages.text: "Ich habe mich Euch geöffnet, doch Ihr wendet Euch so mühelos von mir ab? Nach allem, was Ihr gehört habt? Äußerst bedauerlich. Ich hatte gehofft, in Euch {mf|einen Verbündeten|eine Verbündete} zu finden, doch nun zögert Ihr das traurige Ende Eurer Geschichte nur heraus. Bereitet Euch auf den Tod vor!"
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mich Euch geöffnet, doch Ihr wendet Euch so mühelos von mir ab? Nach allem, was Ihr gehört habt? Äußerst bedauerlich. Ich hatte gehofft, in Euch {mf|einen Verbündeten|eine Verbündete} zu finden, doch nun zögert Ihr das traurige Ende Eurer Geschichte nur heraus. Verteidigt Euch!"

languages.text: « Je me suis confié à vous, mais vous me tournez le dos sans hésiter malgré tout ce que vous avez entendu ? C'est bien dommage. J'espérais que nous pourrions faire cause commune, mais vous ne faites que retarder le triste épilogue de votre histoire. Préparez-vous à mourir ! »
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis confié à vous, mais vous me tournez le dos sans hésiter malgré tout ce que vous avez entendu ? C'est très fâcheux. « J'espérais que nous pourrions faire cause commune, mais vous ne faites que retarder le triste épilogue de votre histoire. Défendez-vous ! »

languages.text: “我向您敞开心扉，对您实话实说，可您呢？您明明听到了所有的真相，却依然漫不经心地拒绝了我？真是遗憾，我本以为您会成为我的盟友，可现在，您仅仅是在拖延必将到来的悲惨结局罢了。受死吧！”
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: “我向您敞开心扉，对您实话实说，可您呢？您明明听到了所有的真相，却依然漫不经心地拒绝了我？真是遗憾，我本以为您会成为我的盟友，可现在，您仅仅是在拖延必将到来的悲惨结局罢了。准备迎战吧！”

languages.text: 「私は心を開いて全てを話したと言うのに、あなたはそれほど簡単に背を背けるというのか？とても残念だ。手を組みたいと思っていた。あなたは悲しい結末を先延ばししているにすぎない。覚悟しろ！」
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はあなたに心を開いて全てを話したと言うのに、あなたはそれほど簡単に背を背けるというのか？ とても残念だ。手を組みたかった。あなたの物語は悲しい結末を先延ばししているだけにすぎない。お覚悟を！」
「私は心を開いて全てを話したと言うのに、あなたはそれほど簡単に背を背けるというのか？とても残念だ。手を組みたいと思っていた。あなたは悲しい結末を先延ばししているにすぎない。覚悟しろ！」

languages.text: «Me sincero con usted y, ¿a pesar de todo lo que ha oído va a darme la espalda con tanta facilidad? Es una lástima. Esperaba poder considerarl{mf|e|a} un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a}, pero ahora solo posterga el trágico fin de su historia. ¡Prepárese para morir!».
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: «Me sincero con usted y, ¿a pesar de todo lo que ha oído va a darme la espalda con tanta facilidad? Es una lástima. Esperaba poder considerarl{mf|e|a} un{mf||a} aliad{mf|o|a}, pero ahora solo posterga el trágico fin de su historia. ¡En guardia!».

languages.text: "O kadar içimi döktüm. Anlattığım onca şeyden sonra tutup bana sırt mı çeviriyorsun? Ne diyeyim, çok yazık. Dost oluruz diye ummuştum ancak olmuyorsa da uzatmanın âlemi yok. Sonun geldi!"
languages.original_text: "I opened myself up to you, but you have so easily turned away from me even after everything you have heard? How very regrettable. I was hoping to find an ally in you, but now you are merely delaying the sorrowful conclusion of your story. Prepare to die!"

traits.locale_text: "O kadar içimi döktüm. Anlattığım onca şeyden sonra tutup bana sırt mı çeviriyorsun? Ne diyeyim, çok yazık. Dost oluruz diye ummuştum ancak olmuyorsa da uzatmanın âlemi yok. Sonun geldi!"
